Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class LivingRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.LivingRoom
public class LivingRoom extends Object
Class representing the LivingRoom of the game. The top row and leftmost column have index 0. The unavailable squares are filled with Item.LOCKED and the empty squares are set to null.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LivingRoom()
    No-args constructor, it initializes the LivingRoom as 9x9 and completely empty.

  • Constructor Details

    • LivingRoom

      public LivingRoom(int numberPlayers)
      Constructor for the class. It sets the prohibited squares and fills the rest of the squares with Items, following the default configurations of the game.
      Parameters:
      numberPlayers - Number of players in the game.

    • LivingRoom

      public LivingRoom()
      No-args constructor, it initializes the LivingRoom as 9x9 and completely empty.

    • selectable

      public boolean selectable(int row, int column)
      Check if the Item at a position in the grid is selectable.
      Parameters:
      row - The row.
      column - The column.
      Returns:
      true iff the content of the square in position (row, column) can be selected.

    • selectable

      public boolean selectable(Position position)
      Checks if the Item at a Position in the grid is selectable.
      Parameters:
      position - The Position of the Item.
      Returns:
      true iff the content of the square in Position can be selected.

      Selects of items from the grid at positions.

      Returns:
